text:
Today we'll learn English with Netflix's most 
viewed series ever! I'm talking about the 1800s

English drama Bridgerton. The name is pronounced 
as Brid ger ton. So we'll watch two romantic

scenes and learn some new vocabulary and by the 
way if you're new here every week we make lessons

just like this one so that you learn English 
without getting lost, without missing the jokes

and without subtitles. Just like Noe who says that 
our lessons help them learn connected speech and

cool vocabulary. If you're ready to take your 
English to the next level too it's really simple

hit that subscribe button and the bell down 
below and you won't miss any of our new lessons.

By the way, do you get frustrated 
when natives speak fast like this

and you can't understand? If you're like most 
learners then I'm certain your answer was yes.

But it is possible for you to understand fast 
speaking natives and we will help you you can

get started right now by signing up for our 
Masterclass. It's free and you only need

one hour or even less over the next week 
to complete it. So if you want to sign up

for that you can do that now by clicking 
up here or down in the description below.

We talked more about this in our lesson 
with another fantastic British series

Peaky Blinders I highly recommend 
that you check out that lesson

next you can find it by getting up 
here or down the description below.

Alright so now it is time for your 
test where you will challenge yourself

by reviewing everything that you have 
learned today and if you love this series

and feel like you can't get enough 
of Bridgerton then I have good news.

We have another lesson with Bridgeton 
that you will find exclusively over

on our Instagram at reallife.english. Why not 
go check out that after you finish the test?
